Class BevShop

  • java.lang.Object
    • BevShop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BevShopInterfce
    public class BevShop
extends java.lang.Object
implements BevShopInterfce
    A class that simulates a beverages shop Processes orders of beverages Stores and shares information on beverage sales
    Author:
    Andrew Christian
